item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different rrestaurants and ber scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Zooma on the Hill (Federal Hill that is). Go down Atwells and it's a purple building on your right.

Zooma Bar Ristorante is a trendy, upscale restaurant in the Federal Hill area known for it's Neapolitan-inspired cuisine and high energy, cosmopolitan atmosphere. The drink menu looks pretty good too! If its warm out, they'll open the windows which is lovely! So, let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing some kind of scarf, but we're hard to miss!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Zooma!
